display_help: Logging out near docks will grant you a random Enhancement after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Smuggler Day Job badge.
display_target_help: Logging out near docks will grant you a random Enhancement after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Smuggler Day Job badge.
